data.content:
noun
plural ~ edges
[count] :the sharp edge of something that is used to cut things
the cutting edge of a knife
the cutting edge :the newest and most advanced area of activity in an art, science, etc.
He's a director who tries to keep his films right on the cutting edge. - often + of
The research we're doing now is at/on the cutting edge of medical technology.
the cutting edge of youth culture
